meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indistinguishable.
meanings.sent1: The indistinguishablenesses of the twins made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishablenesses of the two paintings puzzled the art experts.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishablenesses of the identical cupcakes led to a hilarious mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: In the fog, the indistinguishablenesses of the distant figures created an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishablenesses of the fingerprints left at the crime scene baffled the detectives.

meanings.definition: The inability to be distinguished or differentiated.
meanings.sent1: The indistinguishablenesses of the two fabrics made it hard to choose between them.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishablenesses of the flavors in the dish left the chef disappointed.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishablenesses of the students' handwriting made grading the papers a challenge.
meanings.sent4: In the dark, the indistinguishablenesses of the shadows added to the mystery of the room.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishablenesses of the voices on the phone call made it impossible to identify the caller.
